languages.text: "Странно". {n}Старик морщится, словно от боли.{/n} "Странно, что вы услышали мою исповедь, и странно, что в итоге пришли ко мне. Почему?"
"How odd." {n}He grimaces, as though with pain.{/n} "Odd that you should have listened to my confession, and odd that you should choose to approach me afterward. Why?"
languages.original_text: "Странно". {n}Старик морщится, словно от боли.{/n} "Странно, что вы услышали мою исповедь, и странно, что в итоге пришли ко мне. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "How odd." {n}The old man grimaces, as though with pain.{/n} "Odd that you should have listened to my confession; odd that you should choose to approach me afterwards. Why?"

"How odd." {n}He grimaces, as though with pain.{/n} "Odd that you should have listened to my confession, and odd that you should choose to approach me afterward. Why?"

languages.text: «Qué extraño». {n}Hace una mueca, como si le doliera.{/n} «Es extraño que haya escuchado mi confesión, y más aún que haya decidido hablarme de ello. ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: "How odd." {n}He grimaces, as though with pain.{/n} "Odd that you should have listened to my confession, and odd that you should choose to approach me afterward. Why?"

traits.locale_text: «Qué extraño». {n}Hace una mueca, como si le doliera.{/n} «Es extraño que haya escuchado mi confesión, y más aún que haya decidido hablarme de ello. ¿Por qué?».

languages.text: 「それは妙だ」{n}男はどこか痛むような表情で、ニヤリと笑った。{/n} 「私の告白を聞いたことも、その後、私に近づくことを選んだことも妙だな。理由は？」
languages.original_text: "How odd." {n}He grimaces, as though with pain.{/n} "Odd that you should have listened to my confession, and odd that you should choose to approach me afterward. Why?"

traits.locale_text: 「それは妙だ」{n}男はどこか痛むような表情で、ニヤリと笑った。{/n} 「私の告白を聞いたことも、その後、私に近づくことを選んだことも妙だな。理由は？」

languages.text: “太古怪了。”{n}他皱起了眉，看起来很痛苦。{/n}“真是太古怪了，您竟然听到了我的忏悔，而且您居然想要和我谈谈这个问题。这是为什么？”
languages.original_text: "How odd." {n}He grimaces, as though with pain.{/n} "Odd that you should have listened to my confession, and odd that you should choose to approach me afterward. Why?"

traits.locale_text: “太古怪了。”{n}他皱起了眉，看起来很痛苦。{/n}“真是太古怪了，您竟然听到了我的忏悔，而且您居然想要和我谈谈这个问题。这是为什么？”

languages.text: "Merkwürdig." {n}Er verzieht das Gesicht, als hätte er Schmerzen.{/n} "Merkwürdig, dass Ihr Euch meine Beichte angehört habt, und merkwürdig, dass Ihr entschieden habt, mich anschließend anzusprechen. Warum?"
languages.original_text: "How odd." {n}He grimaces, as though with pain.{/n} "Odd that you should have listened to my confession, and odd that you should choose to approach me afterward. Why?"

traits.locale_text: "Merkwürdig." {n}Er verzieht das Gesicht, als hätte er Schmerzen.{/n} "Merkwürdig, dass Ihr Euch meine Beichte angehört habt, und merkwürdig, dass Ihr entschieden habt, mich anschließend anzusprechen. Warum?"

languages.text: « Comme c'est étrange, {n}répond-il avec une grimace dolente.{/n} Je m'étonne que vous ayez écouté ma confession, et plus encore que vous ayez choisi de venir me voir après cela. Pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: "How odd." {n}He grimaces, as though with pain.{/n} "Odd that you should have listened to my confession, and odd that you should choose to approach me afterward. Why?"

traits.locale_text: « Comme c'est étrange, {n}répond-il avec une grimace dolente.{/n} Je m'étonne que vous ayez écouté ma confession, et plus encore que vous ayez choisi de venir me voir après cela. Pourquoi ? »

languages.text: "Ne kadar da tuhaf." {n}Acı çekiyormuşçasına yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Günah çıkarmamı dinlemeniz de ardından yanıma gelmeye karar vermeniz de çok tuhaf. Nedenini sorabilir miyim?"
languages.original_text: "How odd." {n}He grimaces, as though with pain.{/n} "Odd that you should have listened to my confession, and odd that you should choose to approach me afterward. Why?"
